sentences.en: Any resemblance of a character in this book to a living person is purely incidental.
sentences.cn: 书中人物如有雷同,纯属巧合.

sentences.en: Any resemblance to actual persons, places or events is purely coincidental.
sentences.cn: 如与真人、真实地点或真实事件有雷同之处，纯属巧合。

sentences.en: Clare's close resemblance to his elder sister invoked a deep dislike in him.
sentences.cn: 克莱尔酷似他姐姐，这引起他极大的反感。

sentences.en: He bears a striking resemblance to Lenin.
He was startled by her close resemblance to Tigress.
sentences.cn: 祥子吓了一跳,那个人头,猛一看,非常象虎妞的.

sentences.en: Kehr bears a strong facial resemblance to her sister.
sentences.cn: 凯尔的容貌和她姐姐十分相像.

sentences.en: Our tour prices bore little resemblance to those in the holiday brochures.
sentences.cn: 我们的旅游报价和那些度假手册里的价格相去甚远。

sentences.en: She bears a striking resemblance to her older sister.
She bears resemblance to her mother.
The hero, Danny, bears an uncanny resemblance to Kirk Douglas.
sentences.cn: 主人公丹尼与柯克·道格拉斯出奇地相像。

sentences.en: The resemblance between Susan and her sister was remarkable.
sentences.cn: 苏珊和她的姐姐十分相像。

sentences.en: The story has points of resemblance to a Hebrew myth.
sentences.cn: 这个故事与某个希伯来神话有相似之处.

sentences.en: Their daily menus bore no resemblance whatsoever to what they were actually fed.
sentences.cn: 他们每天的食谱和他们实际吃到的东西完全不同。

sentences.en: There is some resemblance between the accounts of the incident.
sentences.cn: 这一事件的不同记述中,有某些相似之处.

sentences.en: There was a remarkable resemblance between him and Pete.
sentences.cn: 他和皮特有一个惊人的相似之处。

sentences.en: There's a strong resemblance between Susan and Joe.
sentences.cn: 苏珊和乔相貌非常相似.

sentences.en: They all noted his resemblance in speech and manner to the Don.
sentences.cn: 他们大家都看出了,他在谈吐与举止方面都很像他老子.

trans.tran_cn: 相似，形似，外表，外观，相似物，相似点，肖像
trans.tran_en: the fact of being or looking similar to sb/sth
